scripts.restart:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up --build -d
scripts.down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml down || docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml down
scripts.restart:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml up --build -d
scripts.yarn: cd Gateway && yarn && cd .. && cd UsersMS && yarn && cd ..
